So, for example, if `arr` is `[1, 2, 3, 4]`, then after the first iteration, `last_value_value` will be `2 -> 3`, after the second iteration, `last_value_value` will be `3 -> 4`, and after the last iteration, `last_value_value` will be `4`. def give_last(arr):
    last_value = arr[0]
